events.name: update:model-value
events.description: Emitted when component's model value changes; Is also used by v-model

model-value.desc: Model of the component defining the size of first panel (or second if using reverse) in the unit specified (for '%' it's the split ratio percent - 0.0 < x < 100.0; for 'px' it's the size in px); Either use this property (along with a listener for 'update:modelValue' event) OR use v-model directive

reverse.description: Apply the model size to the second panel (by default it applies to the first)

emit-immediately.description: Emit model while user is panning on the separator

horizontal.description: Allows the splitter to split its two panels horizontally, instead of vertically

limits.description: An array of two values representing the minimum and maximum split size of the two panels; When 'px' unit is set then you can use Infinity as the second value to make it unbound on the other side

before-class.description: Class definitions to be attributed to the 'before' panel

after-class.description: Class definitions to be attributed to the 'after' panel

separator-class.description: Class definitions to be attributed to the splitter separator

separator-style.description: Style definitions to be attributed to the splitter separator

dark.description: Applies a default lighter color on the separator; To be used when background is darker; Avoid using when you are overriding through separator-class or separator-style props
